Bug report title: FastDateParser does not handle white-space properly
Bug report description:
The SimpleDateFormat Javadoc does not treat white-space specially, however FastDateParser treats a single white-space as being any number of white-space characters.

This means that FDP will parse dates that fail when parsed by SDP.
Expected Output: Fault Triggering Test: Can you provide one test case for testing the bug? (Please generate a complete and compilable test case code for trigger the bug in the bug report. No other words)
